title: Comedy Coach
description:
Jay and Dan are in studio together with the whole Bonfire Gang. The guys discover a comedy coach by the name of Steve North and are very intrigued by his lessons

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM
